#### *Linking Village-Level Data on Climatic Impact-Drivers, Socioeconomic Vulnerability, and Environmental Conditions to Health Impacts across 12 Philippine Cities*
</br>
</br>
The **Project CCHAIN dataset** is a validated, open-sourced linked dataset measuring 20 years (2003-2022) of climate, environmental, socioeconomic, and health dimensions at the barangay (village) level across 12 Philippine cities. 

This project is supported by the [Lacuna Fund](https://lacunafund.org/) and [Wellcome Trust](https://wellcome.org/).
